page.title: 09FARM FAMILY LIFE,LYDART
page.content: My home life revolves around the work of a mixed arable and sheep farm. We are three in the family,and I cope with all the housework - cleaning, cooking,decorating,and looking after a large garden to provide all our vegetables,the surplus of which I freeze. During the busy seasons of lambing and potato harvesting I help outside whenever needed. This involves careful planning of meals. We have breakfast at 8.30 - sausages,egg,tomatoes,fried potatoes and a cup of tea. Lunch at 1 p.m. is our main meal; supper which consists of something savoury is at 6 p.m. Telephone calls interrupt my day as much farm business is done this way. I have time to join in W.I. and church activities,and to join the Gwent ladies section of the N.F.U.
